languages.text: "Признаться, временами мне невыносимо тяжко нести бремя, возложенное на меня Домом. Я чувствую, что не справляюсь... Расскажите, как удается вам, наследни{mf|ку|це} протектората, каждый день чувствовать на плечах груз ответственности за миллиарды чужих жизней и все равно продолжать нести свою ношу?"

traits.locale_text: "Признаться, временами мне невыносимо тяжко нести бремя, возложенное на меня Домом. Я чувствую, что не справляюсь... Расскажите, как удается вам, наследни{mf|ку|це} торговой империи, каждый день чувствовать на плечах груз ответственности за миллиарды чужих жизней и все равно продолжать нести свою ношу?"
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: "I must confess that sometimes I can hardly bear the burden the House has placed upon me. I feel I am not doing my best... Tell me how you, heir to a protectorate, can bear the responsibility for billions of lives day after day and not stoop under all the weight?"
languages.original_text: "Признаться, временами мне невыносимо тяжко нести бремя, возложенное на меня Домом. Я чувствую, что не справляюсь... Расскажите, как удается вам, наследни{mf|ку|це} протектората, каждый день чувствовать на плечах груз ответственности за миллиарды чужих жизней и все равно продолжать нести свою ношу?"

traits.locale_text: "I must confess that sometimes I can hardly bear the burden the House has placed on me. I feel like I am not doing my best... Tell me how you, an heir to a merchant empire, can bear the responsibility for billions of other lives day after day and not stoop under all the weight?"
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

traits.locale_text: "I must confess that sometimes I can hardly bear the burden the House has placed on me. I feel like I am not doing my best... Tell me how you, an heir to a merchant empire, can bear the responsibility for billions of other lives day after day and not stoop under all the weight?"
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

traits.locale_text: "I must confess that sometimes I can hardly bear the burden the House has placed upon me. I feel I am not doing my best... Tell me how you, heir to a trade empire, can bear the responsibility for billions of lives day after day and not stoop under all the weight?"
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

traits.locale_text: "I must confess that sometimes I can hardly bear the burden the House has placed upon me. I feel I am not doing my best... Tell me how you, heir to a trade empire, can bear the responsibility for billions of lives day after day and not stoop under all the weight?"
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

traits.locale_text: "I must confess that sometimes I can hardly bear the burden the House has placed upon me. I feel I am not doing my best... Tell me how you, heir to a protectorate, can bear the responsibility for billions of lives day after day and not stoop under all the weight?"
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: “我必须承认，有时我很难承担家族为我带来的负担。我会觉得我并没有尽力而为……请告诉我，你，一个王朝的继承人，是如何日复一日地承担数十亿生命的责任，而没有被这样的重担所压垮？”
languages.original_text: "I must confess that sometimes I can hardly bear the burden the House has placed upon me. I feel I am not doing my best... Tell me how you, heir to a protectorate, can bear the responsibility for billions of lives day after day and not stoop under all the weight?"

traits.locale_text: “我必须承认，有时我很难承担家族为我带来的负担。我会觉得我并没有尽力而为……请告诉我，你，一个王朝的继承人，是如何日复一日地承担数十亿生命的责任，而没有被这样的重担所压垮？”
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: «Debo confesar que a veces me cuesta mucho soportar la carga que me ha impuesto la casa. Es como si no me estuviera esforzando al máximo... Dígame, siendo hereder{mf|o|a} de un protectorado, ¿cómo soporta hacerse cargo de miles de millones de vidas día tras día sin derrumbarse por el peso de la responsabilidad?».
languages.original_text: "I must confess that sometimes I can hardly bear the burden the House has placed upon me. I feel I am not doing my best... Tell me how you, heir to a protectorate, can bear the responsibility for billions of lives day after day and not stoop under all the weight?"

traits.locale_text: «Debo confesar que a veces me cuesta mucho soportar la carga que me ha impuesto la casa. Es como si no me estuviera esforzando al máximo... Dígame, siendo hereder{mf|o|a} de un protectorado, ¿cómo soporta hacerse cargo de miles de millones de vidas día tras día sin derrumbarse por el peso de la responsabilidad?».
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: 「正直なところ、家門があたくしに課した重荷に耐えられないこともあります。自分が最善を尽くせていないと感じているのです…保護領の継承者である{name}様が、どうして毎日毎日、何十億もの命の責任を負いながら、その重圧に屈することなくいられるのでしょうか」
languages.original_text: "I must confess that sometimes I can hardly bear the burden the House has placed upon me. I feel I am not doing my best... Tell me how you, heir to a protectorate, can bear the responsibility for billions of lives day after day and not stoop under all the weight?"

traits.locale_text: 「正直なところ、家門があたくしに課した重荷に耐えられないこともあります。自分が最善を尽くせていないと感じているのです…保護領の継承者である{name}様が、どうして毎日毎日、何十億もの命の責任を負いながら、その重圧に屈することなくいられるのでしょうか」
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: "Ich muss gestehen, dass ich die Bürde, die mein Haus mir auferlegt hat, manchmal kaum ertrage. Ich habe das Gefühl, nicht mein Bestes zu geben ... Wie ertragt Ihr als {mf|Erbe|Erbin} des Protektorats Tag um Tag die Verantwortung für Milliarden von Leben, ohne unter der Last zusammenzubrechen?"
languages.original_text: "I must confess that sometimes I can hardly bear the burden the House has placed upon me. I feel I am not doing my best... Tell me how you, heir to a protectorate, can bear the responsibility for billions of lives day after day and not stoop under all the weight?"

traits.locale_text: "Ich muss gestehen, dass ich die Bürde, die mein Haus mir auferlegt hat, manchmal kaum ertrage. Ich habe das Gefühl, nicht mein Bestes zu geben ... Wie ertragt Ihr als {mf|Erbe|Erbin} des Protektorats Tag um Tag die Verantwortung für Milliarden von Leben, ohne unter der Last zusammenzubrechen?"
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: « Je vous avoue que le fardeau que m'a confié ma maison est parfois bien lourd à porter. J'ai l'impression que je pourrais faire mieux... Dites-moi, en tant qu'{mf|héritier|héritière} d'un protectorat comptant des milliards d'âmes, comment faites-vous pour ne pas céder sous le poids des responsabilités ? »
languages.original_text: "I must confess that sometimes I can hardly bear the burden the House has placed upon me. I feel I am not doing my best... Tell me how you, heir to a protectorate, can bear the responsibility for billions of lives day after day and not stoop under all the weight?"

traits.locale_text: « Je vous avoue que le fardeau que m'a confié ma maison est parfois bien lourd à porter. J'ai l'impression que je pourrais faire mieux... Dites-moi, en tant qu'{mf|héritier|héritière} d'un protectorat comptant des milliards d'âmes, comment faites-vous pour ne pas céder sous le poids des responsabilités ? »
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: "İtiraf etmeliyim ki Hanemin sırtıma bindirdiği yükleri taşımakta bazen zorlanıyorum. Elimden geleni yapmıyormuşum gibi geliyor. Bir protektoranın vârisi olarak söyler misin... Günbegün milyarlarca yaşamın sorumluluğunu taşıyorsun. Bunun ağırlığı altında ezilmemeyi nasıl başarıyorsun?"
languages.original_text: "I must confess that sometimes I can hardly bear the burden the House has placed upon me. I feel I am not doing my best... Tell me how you, heir to a protectorate, can bear the responsibility for billions of lives day after day and not stoop under all the weight?"

traits.locale_text: "İtiraf etmem gerekiyor ki Hane'nin sırtıma bindirdiği yükleri taşımakta bazen zorlanıyorum. Elimden geleni yapmıyormuşum gibi geliyor. Bir protektoranın vârisi olarak bana söyleyebilir misin: Günbegün milyarlarca yaşamın sorumluluğunu taşıyorsun. Bunun ağırlığı altında ezilmemeyi nasıl başarıyorsun?"
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion
